CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( Effective_Date__c >= DATE(2018,9,1), Effective_Date__c <= DATE(2020,4,1) ), "BY1",
IF ( AND( Effective_Date__c >= DATE(2020,4,2), Effective_Date__c <= DATE(2021,1,31) ), "BY2",
IF ( AND( Effective_Date__c >= DATE(2021,2,1), Effective_Date__c <= DATE(2022,1,31) ), "BY3",
NULL )))
CustomField.label: Scale Binder Year
